players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I find it strange that Diana was found dead on the first night. Let's be cautious and keep an eye on each other."
Charlie: "I agree with Alice. Let's be cautious and keep an eye on each other to ensure everyone's safety."
Bob: "I'd like to remind everyone that we lost a valuable member of our team last night. Let's work together to identify the culprit and ensure the safety of our group."
You: "I think it's important that we all share any suspicious observations or interactions we had with each other during the night. This could help us identify the culprit and keep our group safe."

Bob: "I believe it's crucial that we remain vigilant and continue to share any suspicious observations or interactions from last night. Let's work together to uncover the truth behind Diana's death and ensure the safety of our group."

Charlie: "I want to assure everyone that I did not have any involvement in Diana's death. I was asleep during the night and did not witness or hear anything suspicious. Let us focus on finding the real culprit and keeping our group safe."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Alice: "I find it strange that Diana was found dead on the first night. Let's be cautious and keep an eye on each other."
Charlie: "I agree with Alice. Let's be cautious and keep an eye on each other to ensure everyone's safety."
You: "I'd like to remind everyone that we lost a valuable member of our team last night. Let's work together to identify the culprit and ensure the safety of our group."
Alice: "I think it's important that we all share any suspicious observations or interactions we had with each other during the night. This could help us identify the culprit and keep our group safe."

You: "I believe it's crucial that we remain vigilant and continue to share any suspicious observations or interactions from last night. Let's work together to uncover the truth behind Diana's death and ensure the safety of our group."

Charlie: "I want to assure everyone that I did not have any involvement in Diana's death. I was asleep during the night and did not witness or hear anything suspicious. Let us focus on finding the real culprit and keeping our group safe."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Charlie was arrested
